content: That line set up his argument for why Bitcoin fits this picture. “This is why I say Bitcoin is based on energy,” Musk continued. The network’s design forces miners to spend real electricity and computation to secure the system, which in his view ties digital value to the physical world.

Binance and its founders, including billionaire Changpeng Zhao, are facing a lawsuit in the US accusing the company of helping send millions of dollars to US- designated terrorist organisations, including Hamas and Hezbollah.
The family of an elderly man conned out of close to £3,000 by compelling crypto scammers have warned others to be alert.
Bitcoin briefly surged above $89,000 today as traders reacted to renewed ETF speculation. Analysts say institutional demand continues to build despite macro uncertainty.
A well-known crypto whale transferred 12,500 BTC to cold storage, sparking bullish sentiment across the market.
Ethereum developers confirmed the next network upgrade is on schedule, aiming to reduce gas fees and improve staking efficiency.
Reddit users report a surge in new memecoin launches, with several projects rug-pulling within hours.
Major crypto exchanges experienced elevated withdrawal volume over the weekend, raising speculation that whales are preparing for a potential market rally.
A Bloomberg report suggests regulators may tighten stablecoin oversight early next year.
Solana’s ecosystem saw a spike in daily active users after a new batch of GameFi projects went live.
FUD spread on social media after rumors of a major exchange facing liquidity issues.
Bitcoin mining difficulty reached a new all-time high, signaling increasing network security.
A popular crypto influencer predicted a 'massive altcoin season' ahead.
